About us

Fabric Manufacturer based in Canada

The Rhinox team consists of three _ based in Toronto, Ontario. We are a people and product first company, based in Toronto, Ontario. Rhinox holds the unique distinction of having the industry leading _ solution. Specifically working with Marine Fabrics. Our expertise lies in 30+ years in the industry With products sourced 100% in Korea, expect the utmost in quality and performance with our wide range of Marine Fabrics. The Rhinox team has a background consisting of a collective 50+ years of experience in the Marine Fabric space. Rhinox looks to connect the Korean and North American markets with Client expansion in the US and Canadian markets heading into 2023. We are looking forward to connecting with you!

Products


Marine Fabric

100% Solution Dyed Ployester
Ask Sample

Product Description
We manufacture a boat cover from dyed polyester woven fabric that is coated with coating materials on the surface. Using polyester solution dyeing with customized colors, the color will not change under solar light for more than five years. Since it is highly durable, it can be maintained in excellent shape after installation.
